resource_gap_analysis.resource_type: Database Administrator with Oracle migration experience
resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of Oracle database migration expertise for 6 Oracle databases
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Potential data loss or corruption during Oracle database migration

resource_gap_analysis.resource_type: Data Migration Specialist with large dataset experience
resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated resource for migrating large datasets (120TB structured, 85TB unstructured)
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Potential delays and performance issues during data migration

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated database migration tool licensed for the project
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Increased manual effort and risk during database migration

resource_gap_analysis.resource_type: Cloud Cost Management and Optimization Tool
resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of cost management and optimization tool for cloud resources
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Potential overspending and inability to meet cost reduction targets

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated tools for generating test data for application testing
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Increased manual effort and potential delays in testing activities

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with Oracle migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required for successful migration of 6 Oracle databases (Project Requirements 2.2)
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Engage external consultants instead of hiring full-time staff

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Data Migration Specialist with large dataset experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required for migrating 120TB structured and 85TB unstructured data (Project Requirements 1.2)
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Utilize cross-functional team members instead of specialized roles

resource_recommendations.justification: Required for efficient and secure database migration (Project Requirements 2.2)
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Cloud Cost Management and Optimization Tool
resource_recommendations.justification: Required to meet cost reduction targets and optimize cloud spend (Budget Constraints 2.2)
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Implement automated solutions instead of manual processes

resource_recommendations.justification: Required for efficient application testing with realistic data (Project Requirements 2.3)

budget_impact_summary.cost_saving_measures: Implement containerization to improve resource utilization
